news.title: Canada to allow some first-time home buyers to pay off mortgage in 30 years
news.para: The move, to be proposed in the upcoming federal budget, will help younger consumers afford a monthly mortgage payment and encourage new supply, Freeland told reporters in Toronto.

news.title: Sweden’s SBB postpones earnings report of Q1 2024
news.para: High debt, high interest rates and a wilting economy have hit many European property companies, with the sector in Sweden among the worst affected.

news.title: SEBI imposes penalties on Prabhu Steel Industries, three others
news.para: Sebi has slapped penalties totalling Rs 12 lakh on Prabhu Steel Industries Ltd (PSIL), its promoters including Harish Gangaram Agarwal, Dinesh Gangaram Agarwal and Akshita Harish Agarwal for flouting regulatory norms.

news.title: DLF to invest Rs 2,200 crore to build shopping mall in Gurugram
news.para: "We have started construction work of 'Mall of India' in Gurugram. The total size of this mall is 26-27 lakh square feet," DLF's Vice Chairman and MD (Rental Business) Sriram Khattar told PTI on the sidelines of a CII conference on the real estate sector.

news.title: Delhi HC holds builder in contempt for obtaining permission to cut tree with forged documents
news.para: The Delhi High Court has found a private builder guilty of contempt for obtaining permission to cut a tree in Lajpat Nagar here based on allegedly forged and fabricated documents from the Forest Department.

news.title: Corporation slammed for not retrieving encroached land in Coimbatore
news.para: A high court division bench had on March 28 directed the corporation commissioner to retrieve a 40ft road worth around 10 crore at VVC Layout from the encroacher.

news.title: Three Tellapur lakes shrink from 45 to 10 acres due to encroachment
news.para: Previously, they covered an area of over 45 acres. Residents blame the absence of adequate underground drainage infrastructure for the three prominent lakes turning into cesspools.

news.title: Hyderabad: Consumer forum orders Sahiti Infratec to refund buyers' money
news.para: The Hyderabad District Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission-3 sanctioned the compensation for mental agony to three complainants — T Bhrahmaiah, a software employee from Guntur, Takkalapalli Sowmya and Takkalapalli Surekha of Madinaguda.

news.title: Senior citizens act not a tool to settle property row: Bombay high court
news.para: HC said the objective under section 23 (1) of Senior Citizens Act  in enabling a tribunal to revoke such gift is based on the intent to ensure the basic needs are protected.

news.title: Aravali land deforested, levelled and fenced off
news.para: A visit to the area by TOI revealed that a substantial portion of the land has been deforested, levelled, fenced off and converted into compounds with boundary walls.

news.title: Home improvement firm Arrivae raises Rs 21 crore in funding
news.para: Arrivae secures Rs 21 crore from Mithun Sacheti to boost supply chain and expand in key markets. The firm offers end-to-end design-to-manufacturing services and has notable investors like Rekha Jhunjhunwala and Harsh Jain on board.

news.title: SC Lowy buys Rs 275 crore bonds issued by Pune-based Pharande Township
news.para: An alternative investment fund backed by SC Lowy has invested in non-convertible debentures (NCD) in the last week of March. While Pharande NCDs do not pay any interest up to June 30, 2024 and 14% until maturity on March 31, 2026.

news.title: Vietnam property tycoon faces verdict in $12.5 billion fraud case
news.para: Truong My Lan, chair of major developer Van Thinh Phat, is accused of swindling the cash from Saigon Commercial Bank (SCB) over a decade.

news.title: Builders in Germany demand billions in subsidies to stem housing crisis
news.para: The subsidies should be used to build 100,000 social housing units and 60,000 new affordable homes to be able to accommodate an influx of workers, avoid pushing people into poverty and create new jobs in the economically key sector, they said on Thursday.

news.title: Vietnam real estate tycoon sentenced to death in $12.5 billion fraud case
news.para: Her trial, begun on March 5 and ending earlier than planned, was one dramatic result of a campaign against corruption that the leader of the ruling Communist Party, Nguyen Phu Trong, has pledged for years to stamp out.

news.title: Goa HC asks why no action has been taken over 42 notices about land illegalities
news.para: “The panchayat must explain why these notices have not been disposed of till date and also indicate the timeline within which such notices will be disposed of,” the high court stated.

news.title: Water shortage hits builders, construction industry in Coimbatore
news.para: Construction industry players said they were forced to extend the deadline of many projects in the absence of sufficient water to carry out work.
